alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:32PM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Michigamme River near Witch Lake affecting Dickinson and Marquette Counties. .Water levels along the Michigamme River near Witch Lake remain high. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Michigamme River near Witch Lake. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood waters cover significant portions of County Road LG between M-95 and Michigamme Dam. Houses near Bengtson Bridge in South Republic are further impacted by flood waters * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:10 PM CDT Saturday /8:10 PM EDT Saturday/ the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 10.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 04/27/2019. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Sunday morning at 1100 AM CDT /1200 PM EDT/.
